titleStmt.title: The third part of Modern reports being a collection of several special cases in the Court of Kings-Bench: in the last years of the reign of K. Charles II. In the reign of King James II. And in the two first years of his present Majesty. Together with the resolutions and judgments thereupon. None of these cases ever printed before. Carefully collected by a learned hand.
Reports. 1660-1726. Vol.3.
titleStmt.author: England. Court of King's Bench.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the assigns of Rich. and Edw. Atkins esqrs; for Charles Harper at the Flower de Luce over-against St. Dunstan's Church in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: With errata at foot of p. 338; with index and advertisment on pp. [1]-[38].
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard Law School Library.

place.placeName: the Flower de Luce over-against St. Dunstan's Church in Fleetstreet
